Title: -One by one, three Russian -dryers- were destroyed, the interval between the downings was about two ...
Description: The story of the legendary anti-aircraft gunner - in social networks of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At dawn on February 24, 2022, around five in the morning, the enemy attacked their -regular post- with missiles of various types, the officer recalls. And in some time they were already -hunting- for their first target from a reserve position, with a clear understanding that there would be no turning back. -In half an hour, they celebrated the downing of the Russian Ka-52 helicopter with synchronized -Yeeeeee!- and applause. It was almost the first combat use of the S-300 PS complex,- the anti-aircraft gunner shares his memories. Maxim's calculation met the war in Donetsk region - in the Druzhkivka area. But soon the anti-aircraft guns overran the entire eastern front line — from Kupyansk to Mariupol. -For some reason, most people are convinced that the work at the anti-aircraft complex is static! Where is there… Almost after each combat launch, we changed the place of deployment. On March 22, we destroyed three Russian -dryers- one by one. The interval between the downed targets was about 2 hours,- recalls Maksym. In April 2022, his unit struck the Il-22PP. The cabin was depressurized, the -board- landed at the airport in Rostov, Russia. -We carried out the first launch on the dry land, then fired two rockets directly at the IL-22. It was learned from the radio interception that the Il-22 made an emergency landing with significant damage. Fortunately, the Su-35 was not able to fly anywhere after our work,- says the anti-aircraft gunner, who now, after his injuries, teaches at the Kharkiv National University of the Air Force. Earlier ArmyInform told about the mobilization, training and war of the commander of the UAV branch in the 128th OGSHBr.

Title: The Ministry of Defense launches a personal account for suppliers of the Armed Forces
Description: This is reported by Rustem Umyerov.

Title: They wanted to build a crossing, but our drone struck a Russian bridge-builder earlier
Description: Video of combat work they publishedon their channel. -The same MTU-72 is an armored bridge-builder that was supposed to pave the way for overturning enemy equipment. Fighters of the Third Assault Division shot down a heavy machine gun with drones,- the fighters said. With the next sorties, they hit another truck, a -loaf- and withdrew from the BC to the Russians. They also shot down a motorcyclist and hit the enemy UAV twice. -All targets were destroyed by the fighters of the Punk group from the 2nd mechbat of the brigade!- - added the defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the Third Separate Assault Brigade in Kharkiv Oblast with FPV drones -ale-rosiyan-chekav-syurpryz/->eliminated a group of enemy infantry that tried to sneak up to Ukrainian positions through the swamp.

Title: The US ambassador reacted to the airstrike in Kharkiv: -this night, Russia killed a small child-
Description: She reported this on her page on the X network. In particular, the US ambassador emphasized , that a child was a victim of Russian aggression. -Russia continues its brutal attacks on Ukraine, killing a young child and injuring 35 people in Kharkiv tonight, as well as damaging civilian infrastructure in other parts of the country,- Brigitte Brink stressed in her post. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Russian troops struck a nine-story residential building in Kharkiv with a guided aerial bomb, which caused significant destruction and numerous victims. As of 1:30 p.m., it is known that as a result of the Russian airstrike carried out by the occupiers on the night of October 30, died two more people: a man and a 15-year-old boy. Their bodies were retrieved from the rubble.

Title: Foreign investors invested $25 million in the development of Ukrainian defense technologies through ...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and Technology. Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. One of the key tools for attracting investments is regular events, such as invest demo days, where matchmaking takes place between companies and investors. For example, Swarmer, which develops artificial intelligence for drone swarms, attracted $2.7 million in foreign investment during one such event. Brave1 also updates the catalog of partner companies every month, providing investors with depersonalized information about 130+ startups and explaining the structure of the Ukrainian defense innovation system. The platform aims to attract $50 million in investment by the end of the year, which will allow companies to scale and develop their products faster. As reported by ArmyInform, at the Brave1 training ground, tests of the three most anticipated technologies, aimed at increasing the efficiency of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, took place.

Title: Conquered space for the sake of Russians: another Kremlin henchman was detained in Kharkiv
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. These satellites are used to detect the positions of the Ukrainian military, adjust enemy fire and conduct reconnaissance. The attacker, who holds the post of general director of a Russian company, entered into contracts with the Roscosmos corporation and provided his company's testing ground at the disposal of the Russian military and space forces. He signed all documents remotely via e-mail, and gave instructions to Russian subordinates in messenger chats. The investigation established that the suspect lived in Russia for a long time and participated in the Kremlin's resettlement program to the aggressor country. His subversive activities were documented, and he was detained at his residence in Kharkiv. During the searches, the law enforcement officers seized a Russian passport, computers and phones with evidence, as well as more than 10 million hryvnias, probably received for cooperation with the occupiers. The man is suspected under Article 111-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (assistance to the aggressor state). He is currently in custody and may receive up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. The investigation continues, law enforcement officers are working to identify other persons involved in assisting the aggressor. Previously, ArmyInform reported about pseudo-linerka in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia.

Title: The situation at the front is worsening: 79 clashes per day, the occupiers do not stop their assault...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. Sumy and Chernihiv regions continue to suffer from artillery shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Thus, areas of border settlements came under the influence of enemy fire. Among them are Pokrovka, Bachivsk, Shalygine, Novenke, Leonivka, Basivka, Pavlivka and Korenyok. It is also currently known about seven air strikes on the Kursk region, during which the enemy dropped 13 air bombs. In the Kharkiv direction, an enemy attack in the Vovchansk region is currently underway. Two enemy attacks have already been repulsed near Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy began storming the positions of our units near Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovy, Lozova, Berestovoy and Vyshnevoy seven times. Six clashes are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, during the day, the invading army carried out 12 attacks on Ukrainian positions in the direction of Katerynivka, Stepovoy, Grekivka, Terni and in the Serebryansky forest. Eight clashes have ended, four are ongoing. The occupiers were beaten by NARs in the Serebrian Forest. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy twice tried to improve his position. Ukrainian soldiers gave a worthy rebuff. The occupier dropped four aerial bombs in the Katerynivka district. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made ten attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Pokrovsky direction. Fighting continues near Promen, Lysivka and Vishnevo. Myrolyubivka and Myrnograd were hit by the KAB. 22 enemy attacks were recorded in the districts of Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Ostrivskyi, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka and Elizavetivka in the Kurakhivka direction. In the Antonivka district, the occupiers are making the main efforts - they have conducted ten assaults, three of which are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, two skirmishes continue near Bogoyavlenka and Trudovoy. Two attacks today have already been repelled by Ukrainian defenders. In the direction of Orihiv, the occupiers attacked twice in the direction of Novodanilivka. The enemy dropped eight guided aerial bombs on Yurkivka, Tavriysky and in the area of ​​Malaya Tokmachka. In the Dnieper direction two enemy assaults were successfully repelled. There are no major changes in the rest of the directions. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian troops hold Toretsk - the enemy has not yet advanced beyond the eastern outskirts of the city, the number of assaults is decreasing.

Title: The Ukrainian armored personnel carrier -Bucephal- destroys the Russians, a double blow to the enemy...
Description: The invaders tried several times to hit our Bradley with the help of an FPV drone and ATGM, the drone stuck and did not explode, and the projectile did not cause any damage to our BMP. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighters of the 15th Brigade of the National Guard -Kara-Dag- dismantle the fortified area of ​​the Russians. Ukrainian BTR-4E -Bucephal- destroys houses with occupants who tried to gather for further assaults. At night, in the Lyman direction, the Russians decided to ride to our positions on a motorcycle. However, their two-wheeler broke down and while they were trying to fix it, they were spotted by drone pilots of the 63rd OMBr. At one point in the dark autumn night, the bodies of the dead occupants began to be illuminated, they burned until the very morning. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko and lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura.

Title: Direct mobilization: the military can select units for service without the involvement of the TCC
Description: About this during the briefing reported the head of the mobilization and defense work sector of the Zaporizhzhia regional TCC and SP Lt. Col. Andriy Yakunin. According to the new order, candidates for mobilization can now apply directly to military units, where they will be tested and interviewed. Medical examination and final recruitment are carried out through the territorial center, but unit commanders play the main role in selection. This approach allows conscripts to get into the chosen unit after completing basic military training. Lieutenant Colonel Andriy Yakunin noted that in the Zaporizhzhia region mobilization measures continue every month, despite the fact that part of the region remains temporarily occupied. Residents of the region are actively joining the Armed Forces of Ukraine, realizing the danger of war. The mobilization of special vehicles is also ongoing, but there are no plans to seize ordinary cars of citizens. -No one but us will protect our country. We must defend our freedom and independence,- concluded Andriy Yakunin. As reported by ArmyInform, an agitation campaign is underway in Lviv region, aimed at attracting high school students to enter higher military educational institutions (VVNOZ).

Title: A new military support system: a focus on individual and gender needs
Description: The relevant Procedure developed by the Ministry of Defense approved by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine. The procedure provides for the provision of uniforms and equipment taking into account the anthropometric data of servicemen, the provision of personal hygiene equipment and the improvement of annual medical examinations. If necessary, medical assistance will be provided in state or communal institutions. The document also defines the procedure for providing psychological support to servicemen who were exposed to stress factors in combat conditions or suffered from sexual harassment. Such assistance will be provided in a secure and confidential manner. Separately, the issue of psychological support for family members of servicemen, in particular those whose relatives are in captivity, have disappeared or are currently in the environment, has been regulated. Such help will be provided by specialists at the territorial centers of recruitment and social support. The new procedure also provides for the application of a gender-oriented approach during the development of budget programs of the Security and Defense Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, Ministry of Defense implements NATO standards regarding of gender equality in the Armed Forces.

Title: - The main thing in reconnaissance is to keep a cool head and be confident in your comrades- - parat...
Description: reports this on the official page of the brigade. -We are the first to go! We enter ground zero, where we do not know what is happening there and who is there. Our job is to find out the front line of the enemy, what their means are, what they do and how they work. And continue to oppose the enemy by all available means,- says the scout. Anton comes from Dnipropetrovsk region. Before the large-scale invasion, he worked as a miner. The fighter decided to mobilize in order to protect the country and his relatives. I am convinced that service in the Armed Forces is the best contribution to victory over the enemy. -To protect my mother, to protect my relatives and everyone I care about. Who, if not us? It is necessary to restrain the enemy. Intelligence found me by itself. Representatives of the brigade arrived and made a selection. I went for an interview, talked and that's how I got here, right after BZVP. And still in the ranks of these powerful men,- says Anton. The fighter is currently working in Kurshchyna. For reconnaissance, this is one of the most dangerous directions. The enemy is motivated, the terrain is unfamiliar, because of this it is not always possible to work quietly. -In Kurshchyna, they entered the deep rear of the enemy. There was a case: we approached the village, gave the coordinates and waited for instructions. The voices of our two opponents were heard. It so happened that we were ambushed on the way. They did not agree to lay down their arms, so they transformed into another life. Next, we found the house where the -Akhmatovs- were. We had a fight there, not everything went according to plan, they ran away. We got a good foothold there, took control of the positions and led our boys. They did a good job,- adds the defender. Anton recently received the medal -For Military Service to Ukraine- from the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, for numerous successful combat missions and exemplary service. -For me, this award is proof that we are going in the right direction. We protect the Motherland! But I am not here for awards, I did not set myself such a goal. The main thing is to restrain the enemy and protect Ukraine!- Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the -Kings of Swamps- sneaked across the river to our position, but the Russians were waiting for a -surprise-.

Title: Budget 2025: record spending on security and defense
Description: told Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal. All tax revenues from citizens and businesses will be directed to strengthening Ukraine's military capabilities. More than UAH 2.2 trillion is earmarked for defense needs, which is about 26% of GDP and UAH 46 billion more than in 2024. The total expenditures of the budget for 2025 are planned in the amount of more than 3.6 trillion UAH, which is 535 billion UAH higher than current expenditures. Revenues of the general fund of the budget will also increase and will amount to UAH 2.7 trillion, which is UAH 411 billion more than last year. The state leadership thanked the people's deputies for their support of the draft budget and hoped for its quick approval as a whole.

Title: -Indifferent to their soldiers and equipment-: the occupiers' aviation demonstrates -friendly fire-
Description: This was told by the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon - Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, in urban battles in Toretsk, the infantry is active, preventing the enemy from advancing. Despite the smaller number of enemy assaults, the number of shelling does not decrease. The enemy uses both artillery and aviation. Moreover, airstrikes are not distinguished by their accuracy - the Russians often strike in their own way. -It has been known for a long time that the leadership of the Russian army does not care about its soldiers, does not care about equipment - they don't care. And that's why they can freely use aviation, Toretsk is flown by every day,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. Previously ArmyInform reported that the enemies are trying to storm in the Toretsk and Kramatorsk directions, but despite the attack, they are not succeeding.

Title: The bodies of two more victims, including a 15-year-old boy, were recovered from the rubble in Khark...
Description: Kharkiv Mayor Ihor Terekhov informs about this. -The body of a young man, 25-30 years old, was just found from under the rubble of the house. In total, 36 are injured at the moment. The attack on the residential building was carried out last night with the help of the FAB-500 from the UMPK,- the message reads. Later, they identified the place where the body of another child killed by Russian bombs is located, it was taken out from under the rubble. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Russian troops struck a nine-story residential building in Kharkiv with a guided aerial bomb, which caused significant destruction and numerous victims.

Title: The car of a serviceman of the Armed Forces was set on fire - two Kharkiv residents will appear in c...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, at the end of July of this year, 30-year-old and 47-year-old Kharkiv residents, wanting to make extra money, established contact with the -employer- - according to preliminary information, an employee of the Russian special service - through the Telegram messenger. The curator gave the men the task of setting fire to the car of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On August 1 of this year, around 2 a.m., while on Byron Avenue in Kharkiv, the perpetrators saw a camouflage-colored Jeep Grand Cherokee. Using a highly flammable mixture prepared in advance, the defendants set fire to the vehicle, as a result of which the car burned. After committing the crime, the men fled from the scene. However, the law enforcement officers promptly identified the perpetrators and detained them in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. It is established that the -employer- promised to pay 1,000 US dollars for the successful completion of the task, but the men never received the money. At the request of the prosecution, preventive measures in the form of detention were chosen for the arsonists. They will be tried in the Comintern District Court of Kharkiv. The accused face up to ten years in prison. Previously, ArmyInform reported about the pseudo-linerka in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia.

Title: The occupiers destroyed the oldest school in Mariupol, built in the 19th century
Description: Mariupol City Council informs about this. During the Second World War, the building was used as a hospital. After 80 years, in 2022, wounded people died here again from military shelling. A shelter was set up at the school. But this did not stop the Russians from destroying the historic building. Now the invaders are erecting a new building in an attempt to destroy the evidence of their crimes. And together with them, they destroy the history of Mariupol. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the occupiers control mobile communications and the Internet to identify pro-Ukrainian residents.

Title: Combat training of soldiers does not stop even on the line of fire, Sergeant Oleksandr
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -It's normal for an adequate man to want to defend his Motherland!- - this is how Oleksandr under the pseudonym -Pylip- answers the question about his voluntary desire to serve in the army.

Title: A pseudo-clinician in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. According to the SBU, a local resident, being in direct contact with an employee of the Russian special service, collected information about the coordinates of Ukrainian units in the Kharkiv direction. To gather intelligence, the agent tried to establish contact with the Ukrainian military, offering help in household matters, in particular, cleaning services for a nominal fee. Under the guise of -friendly- conversations, she learned about their location and transferred the collected data to the Russian curator in the form of screenshots with marks on Google maps. SBU counter-intelligence agents exposed the agent in advance and arrested her red-handed when she was near a military object for reconnaissance. During the detention, a mobile phone was seized from her, which she used to communicate with the Russian special service. The woman is suspected under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). She is currently in custody and could face life in prison with forfeiture of property. As reported by ArmyInform, in Bukovyna, intruders spied on military echelons and prevented mobilization.

Title: The occupiers monitor mobile communications and the Internet to identify pro-Ukrainian residents
Description: Andrii Chernyak, representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, reported this. According to him, after seizing Ukrainian telecommunications equipment, the Russian occupiers reprogrammed it for their own purposes. This gives them the opportunity to monitor citizens, record their attempts to access prohibited Internet resources or use messengers. -The occupiers create fake information resources and accounts similar to Ukrainian ones in order to attract Ukrainian citizens and then detain them,- noted Andriy Chernyak. He also called on the residents of the occupied territories to be vigilant and seek contacts and safety instructions on the official resources of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, if they intend to help Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kremlin decided to form assault units from convicted patients with hepatitis -B- and -C- and send them to war against Ukraine.

Title: Death on his shoulder: he ran, shot, fell, got up, shot again, but still could not save himself
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page. The video shows one of the occupants trying to escape from the Ukrainian drone, then he opens fire with a small-arms weapon. The run of the Russian invader ends with a fall. As soon as he gets to his feet, he is met by a drone. A number of other occupiers died while traveling in vehicles. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danilo zseredyny/->made a small movie about the combat work of their BMP-1, performing tasks in Donetsk region. Also, fighters of the battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Rarog- of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo vid-nashyh-droniv/->recorded unsuccessful attempts of Russian attack aircraft to deceive Ukrainian FPV drones.

Title: Kamikaze drones hit the Kherson region: local residents were injured
Description: This is reported by Khersonska ODA. Around 7:00 a.m., the occupiers attacked Antonivka with the help of drones. As a result of dropping explosives, a 77-year-old woman was injured, who received a blast injury. Three people went to the hospital after yesterday's shelling of Blagovishchenskyi in the Kherson district. A 51-year-old woman and two men, 56 and 20, were injured, all with blast injuries. In the morning, there was also a drone attack on the Ship district of Kherson, as a result of which a 33-year-old man received an explosive injury. At 11:20, the occupiers struck Beryslav. The victim, a 42-year-old woman who was near the store, suffered a blast injury, contusion and shrapnel injuries. Also, medical assistance was provided to a 63-year-old man who was injured yesterday in Stanislav during an enemy attack from a UAV. He was diagnosed with blast injury and concussion. As reported by ArmyInform, victims and destruction in Kherson region: Russians targeted the library and private houses.

Title: -Sanalization- Russians in Chasovoy Yar: the enemy dies en masse trying to cross the canal
Description: A representative of the press service of 24 separate mechanized Andriy Polukhin of the King Danylo brigade. According to Andriy Polukhin, the enemy is storming in small infantry groups. Attempts are being made to bring personnel into the destroyed temporarily occupied Kanal neighborhood and cross the canal directly. However, at the moment, the enemy cannot do this. -Sometimes such a group can go beyond the canal, into one of the destroyed buildings near it, but it turns out to be blocked. Then it reveals itself in these ruins, and our guys work on that point,- said the representative of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo. Earlier ArmyInform reported about how soldiers of the self-propelled artillery division 24 of the separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo systematically and accurately destroy the infantry, vehicles, vehicles and fortifications of the occupiers.

Title: Once and for all: a sniper from a distance of one and a half thousand meters destroyed the occupier ...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -the Russian becomes -good- at a distance of 1437 meters. The snipers of the 68th OEBr are the best!- - commented the Ukrainian defenders. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how pilots of the 68th hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush struck the occupier who crawled towards our positions. Also interesting behavior Russian attack aircraft was captured by fighters of the -Shershni Dovbush- attack drone company of the 68th Yeger Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush.

Title: In Bukovina, intruders spied on military echelons and prevented mobilization
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, these men secretly recorded the movement directions of the railway echelons of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and publicly called on conscripts to evade conscription. The operatives of the SBU established that the 41-year-old local resident, in the past a member of the banned Communist Party of Ukraine, came -to the attention- of the FSB back in 2015. After the start of the large-scale invasion, he was finally recruited and instructed to form his own agent network in Bukovina. He spread Kremlin narratives, denied the legitimacy of state power in Ukraine, and tried to create alternative -local self-government bodies.- Also, on the instructions of the curators, the person involved incited local men of draft age to hide from the TCC and spied on the routes of movement of mobile units of the Armed Forces. To carry out a hostile task, the agent recruited a 35-year-old local unemployed man, whom he allegedly could -dissuade- from the draft. The security service gradually documented the criminal actions of both figures and detained them. During the searches, mobile phones with evidence of subversive activities were seized from the perpetrators. On the basis of the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service notified the FSB agent of the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 (treason committed under martial law), and to his accomplice under Part 3 of Art. 114-2 (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the SBU and the National Police detained Russian accomplices, who, on the order of the Rashists, set fire to the offices of Ukrposhta and relay cabinets of Ukrzaliznytsia.

Title: - Enemy infantry forcefully advances-: an effective response to North Korea — supply of 155-mm shell...
Description: Andriy Kovalenko, the manager, told about this on the air of the -Edyny Novyny- telethon. Center for countering disinformation of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine. According to him, the best solution would be for South Korea to supply additional 155mm artillery ammunition. -In fact, compared to Russia, we now have less ammunition on the front, and because of this, the Russian infantry is advancing so forcefully in the east. Accordingly, additional ammunition would be great,- said the head of the Center for Countering Disinformation of the NSDC. Earlier ArmyInform reported about whether the units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, operating in Kurshchyna, encountered North Korean military personnel.

Title: The incompetent journey of the occupiers was interrupted by a mine: the BMP of the Russian Federatio...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -The useless journey of the Russian invaders was interrupted by a mine on the path laid by sappers,- the military assured. After that, the BMP was finished off by the pilots of attack UAVs, who, with the help of FPV drones, successfully demilitarized the Russian equipment. -Units of the brigade are currently fighting in the Pokrovsky direction. They repulse the attacks of the enemy, who traditionally does not spare personnel and equipment, conducting constant assaults,- Ukrainian defenders noted. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Defense Forces showed unique footage of the destruction of a whole group of Russian attack aircraft that tried to capture the position of the guards of the -Red Kalina- NSU.

Title: Russian troops continue to terrorize Donetsk region: at least four people were killed
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district. The Kurakhiv community was under constant fire. One person died in Uspenivka, three houses and a business were damaged. A person also died in Berestki, several houses were damaged. One person was injured in Dalny and Kurakhovo, and an enterprise was damaged in Sontsivka. A house was damaged in the village of Shevchenko of the Pokrovsk community. Kramatorsky district. Two people died, a house was destroyed and another five were damaged in Zarichnoy of the Lymansk community. An enterprise was damaged in Myrny of the Slavic community. In Kostyantynivka, six private houses, a shop, a utility room, a power line and four gas pipelines were damaged. Bakhmut district. In Siversk, one house was destroyed and six were damaged. One person was injured in Shcherbynivka of the Torecki community. Eight private houses, four high-rise buildings and two industrial buildings were damaged in the Chasovoyarsk community. During the day, Russian troops shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 25 times. 189 people were evacuated from the front line, including 25 children. As reported by ArmyInform, in Dnipro suffered as a result of another Russian attack teenager.

Title: Spies, saboteurs, militants: the enemy terrorizes the northern border
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -The only news- reported the spokesman of the State Border Service of Ukraine Andriy Demchenko. In particular, in his speech, the spokesman noted a decrease in the activity of enemy sabotage and intelligence groups. -The enemy did not give up its sabotage activities, especially within the borders of Sumy Oblast. Although the activity of enemy sabotage and reconnaissance groups has significantly decreased compared to previous periods, saboteurs continue to try to enter our territory,- Andriy Demchenko said. ArmyInform has already told that the border guards are building fortifications in the north.

Title: -The kings of the swamps- crept across the river to our position, but the Russian was waiting -surpr...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -Kharkivshchyna. Infantry minced meat. The KEHTU crew is working - kudos to these Cossacks. We destroy the enemy every day!- - commented the Ukrainian defenders. The fighters said that they needed FPVs to attack the Russians and called on people to support them and donate. Earlier ArmyInform showed how the soldiers of the Third Separate Assault Brigade in Kharkiv Oblast hit two tanks, two mortars and Russian infantry in shelters.

Title: Targeted strikes: Defense forces hit warehouses, air defense equipment and radar stations of the occ...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08 :00 October 31. Yesterday, the enemy launched two missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas using 11 missiles, as well as 83 airstrikes, in particular, dropping 146 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out 5,049 attacks, of which 137 were from rocket salvo systems, and also used to destroy 1,618 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Myropillia, Khotin, Novenke, Stetskivka, Pysarivka settlements of the Sumy region; Kharkiv, Mali Prohody, Kudiivka, Kozacha Lopan, Kupyansk, Golubivka, Podoli, Petropavlivka of the Kharkiv region; Druzhba, Myrnograd, Romanivka, Kurakhove of the Donetsk region; Little Tokmachka, Transfiguration of the Zaporizhzhia region. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of October 31, 2024, the enemy -aviaczijni-rakety/->attacked the bridge across the Belgorod-Dniester estuary in Zatoka in Odesa. Two Iskander-M/KN-23 ballistic missiles were launched from Crimea and eight Kh-59/69 guided air missiles from tactical aircraft over the Black Sea.

Title: Ukraine and Denmark discussed key support within the Fighter and Air Defense Coalitions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. During the conversation, Colonel Andriy Lebedenko informed his Danish colleague about the operational situation on the front line. He spoke in detail about the current needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, especially emphasizing the need to strengthen the Ukrainian army with multi-purpose combat aircraft, air defense equipment, artillery ammunition and military equipment. The Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces emphasized the war crimes committed by the Russian aggressors, in particular, the indiscriminate mass attacks on civilian objects and violations of international humanitarian law by the occupiers. Colonel Andriy Lebedenko expressed hope for practical support from the partner countries in the implementation of the Victory Plan. At the end of the meeting, the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces thanked Lieutenant General Kenneth Pedersen, the Government of the Kingdom of Denmark and the Danish people for their leadership in the activities of the Fighter Coalition, as well as for their active participation in the Coalitions for demining, artillery, integrated air and missile defense and providing timely and valuable assistance in the fight with the Russian aggressor. As reported by ArmyInform, Alexander Syrsky called for an international reaction to the participation of the North Korean military in the war on the side of Russia.

Title: The truck is on fire, and the occupiers are running away: the Russians were not happy about the visi...
Description: The video of the combat work appeared on the channel of Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The highest level of skill: 412 obBps Nemesis operators accurately hit an enemy truck on the move. We control, detect, and destroy the enemy's logistics — day and night,- the military assured. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 412th Unmanned Systems Battalion of the Nemesis Unmanned Systems Force Armed forces in one event destroyedth place of storage of enemy ammunition, and transport.

Title: Another Russian attack injured a teenager in Dnipro
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Also, in the Kamian district, a car was involved in the attack, fortunately, no one was injured. The next morning, Nikopol was hit again. The aggressor used a kamikaze drone to attack the city, and the consequences of the attack are currently being investigated. As reported by ArmyInform, during last day, the aggressor attacked the Dnipropetrovsk region more than two dozen times. Used artillery and UAVs. Aimed at two districts.

Title: Attacks -one-way technique-: the Russians attack on everything that has wheels
Description: Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev told about this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- NSU brigade. For fast movement, the enemy uses motorcycles and buggies, ATVs and -loaves-. However, they note in the -Charter- team, it is not used for long. -It is rare that this technique is reversed. This is usually a one-way technique. That is why there are quite a lot of burnt motorcycles and buggies around the landing sites where the enemy is hiding in our area of ​​responsibility,- said Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier ArmyInform reported that Russian troops are sending reinforcements to Kharkiv region, new units are trying to move under the cover of bad weather.

Title: Oleksandr Syrsky called for an international reaction to the participation of the North Korean milit...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. The main topic of discussion was the current situation at the front, where intense fighting continues. The troops of the Russian Federation, having a numerical advantage in personnel and equipment, continue active assault actions in several directions. Oleksandr Syrskyi emphasized the need to strengthen the military-technical assistance of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in order to counter the enemy's offensive. The generals also discussed the issue of the international reaction to the involvement of the North Korean military contingent in hostilities on the Russian side, stressing the importance of tough measures by the world community. As reported by ArmyInform, fierce battles at the front: The Armed Forces restrain the enemy's onslaught in many directions.

Title: Forest of corpses: paratroopers destroyed the entire assault group of marines of the Pacific Fleet o...
Description: They published the corresponding video on their channel. -Ukrainian paratroopers continue to show a master class on the destruction of bastards from the 155th Marine Brigade of the Pacific Fleet of the Russian Federation in Kurshchyna. This time, Polish paratroopers repelled an assault by marines who tried to attack Ukrainian positions,- the military said. During the battle, the entire assault group of the Russian invaders was completely destroyed. -From radio intercepts, it became known that among the personnel of the 155th OBrMP units, cases of arbitrarily leaving the areas of combat missions continue to increase, in connection with which the personnel are threatened with shooting in case of arbitrarily leaving their positions,- the paratroopers added. The video contains brutal footage As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces broke up a group of the so-called special unit -Akhmat- which attacked our positions.

Title: Reconstruction in Russian: in Luhansk Oblast there was one less house
Description: This was reported by the head of Luhansk OVA, Artem Lysogor. The occupiers directed 25 drones towards Ukrainian positions and populated areas of the Luhansk Region. Also, the invaders promise to -connect- the heating in Seversko-Donetsk only at the end of November. -Last two winters, local residents did not wait for the result. At the moment, urgent work is underway on more than 4 km of the heating system - these areas have not been touched in the previous two years. The occupiers have not yet suppressed internal networks either,- noted the head of the Luhansk OVA. In addition, an apartment building was demolished in Seversko-Donetsk the other day. -It was located on Tsentralny Avenue and was damaged by the enemy during the storming of the city in 2022. For now, the invaders have decided to dismantle it - to remove the successor of their own war crimes. Russians don't build new housing,- Artem Lysohor emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kremlin is considering a draft law which -lnr/->declassifies information about the activities of the occupation authorities, in particular on the territory of the so-called lnr. This will make it possible to hide numerous crimes, including war crimes.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which will be announced in all mass media regardless of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Air defense units destroyed 17 enemy UAVs and 2 guided air missiles
Description: This is reported by Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The occupiers also struck Kramatorsk with two Iskander-M/KN-23 ballistic missiles from the Rostov region. From the directions of Kursk, Orel - Russian Federation. the enemy attacked with 43 UAVs of the Shahed type and drones of an unspecified type. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, units of electronic defense systems and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Air defense worked in Odesa, Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Kharkiv, Zaporizhzhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Donetsk and Poltava regions. In addition to the downing of two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles in the evening in Odesa, as of 08:00, the downing of 17 enemy anti-aircraft missiles was confirmed. 23 drones were lost in location, three more Russian UAVs left the controlled airspace in the direction of the Russian Federation and the temporarily occupied territory of Ukraine. The information is being refined and updated. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Kyiv once again poshkodzhennya/->came under air attack by Russian troops. This is already the twentieth attempt to attack the capital since October, and the enemy again used drones.

Title: Fierce battles at the front: the Armed Forces hold back the enemy's onslaught in many directions
Description: About this is going on in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 08:00 on October 31. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy attacked once near Vovchansk, actively using aviation. In the Kupyan direction, 21 attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Sinkivka, Novoosynivka, Kolisnikivka, Pershotravnevo, Pischany, Kruglyakivka, Zeleny Gay, Vyshnevoy, Bohuslavka, Petropavlivka, Lozova, Kindrashyvka, and Zagryzovy. On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked 11 times. Tried to move forward in the direction of Katerynivka, Grekivka, Terniv, Zarichny, Druzhelyubivka and in the Serebryansk Forestry. . In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. The tense situation remains in the Pokrovsky direction, where our the defenders stopped 28 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Sukhyi Yar, Novogrodivka, Vyshneve, Krutiy Yar and Selidove. In the direction of Kurakhiv Forces defense repulsed 41 attacks on positions near Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Illinka, Maksimilianivka, Gostroy, Elizavetivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, Kurakhivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, and Katerynivka. In the direction of Vremivka the enemy carried out eight assaults on our positions in the Bogoyavlenka, Maksimivka, Trudovoy, and Novoukrainka districts. Actively used attack and bomber aircraft for strikes in the direction. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy made one futile attempt to push our defenders from the occupied lines near the settlement of Charivne. In the Dnieper direction, the operational situation has not changed significantly. The enemy carried out four unsuccessful assaults. In the Orihiv and Toretsk directions the enemy did not carry out assault operations, but attacked populated areas with assault and bombing aircraft. In the Volyn and Poliske directions, no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. span> The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region, over the past day the Russians have struck 19 strikes with 20 guided aerial bombs, carried out 133 artillery strikes on the territory of the Russian Federation. =-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/10/31/1310-okupantiv-ta-blyzko-dvoh-desyatkiv-tankiv-genshtab-zsu-oprylyudnyv-vtraty-rosiyi/->constituted 1310 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 19 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 58 artillery systems, one rocket salvo fire system, eight air defense systems, 84 operational-tactical UAVs, 2 cruise missiles, 121 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Victims and destruction in the Kherson region: the Russians targeted the library and private houses
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Beryslav, Blagovishchenske, Bilozerka, Havrylivka, Dudchany, Mykilske, Priozerne, Stanislav, Novokairy, Kizomys, Zelenivka, Komyshany, Sadov, Novoraisk and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. It is noted that the Russian military targeted the library and office premises; residential blocks of populated areas of the region, in particular, a high-rise building and 21 private houses were damaged. The occupiers also mutilated garages, a bus and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday the terrorists /->attackedthe territory of one of the communal transport enterprises of the Kherson City Council. As a result of this shelling, buildings and several vehicles - buses and trucks - were damaged. No people were hurt.

Title: Zaporizhzhia under fire: 384 strikes per day on residential areas and infrastructure
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 10 airstrikes on Preobrazhenka and Malya Tokmachka. In addition, 228 UAVs of various modifications attacked Stepnohirsk, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Olhivske. Also, 5 shellings from RSZV covered Orihiv, Mala Tokmachka and Biloghirya. According to the head of the OVA, 141 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyno, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Olhivsko. -We received 5 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, Kyiv survived the twentieth drone attack since October: debris caused fires and damage. We will remind you about the consequences of the air strike on Kharkiv: an 11-year-old boy died under the rubble.

Title: The enemy has reduced the number of ships in the Mediterranean
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As ArmyInform reported, the Russians are forced to hide in their base in Novorossiysk, but they have a new hobby.

Title: 1,310 occupiers and about two dozen tanks: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announce...
Description: About this informs General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 31.10.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kupyan direction in six months, the occupiers lost more than 4 thousand personnel, more than 150 units of equipment - destroyed.

Title: Kyiv survived the twentieth drone attack since October: the debris caused fires and damage
Description: reported this by the head of the Kyiv City Military Administration Serhiy Popko, kamikaze drones entered the city in waves from different directions. During the night, the air alert was announced twice, its total duration was two and a half hours. Thanks to the effective actions of air defense forces and radio electronic warfare (ERW), all enemy drones threatening Kyiv were neutralized. The exact number and type of drones will be announced by the Air Force at a later date. As a result of falling debris, a fire broke out in an open area in the Podilsk district of the capital, which was quickly extinguished. Windows of two residential buildings and an administrative building were also damaged. In addition, damage to the high-voltage power line was recorded. According to preliminary data, there is no information about the victims. October was an extremely busy month for Kyivans, with 20 airstrikes in 31 days. Air raid alarms were sounded almost every day, and only one day went by without sirens. As reported by ArmyInform, the consequences of the air strike on Kharkiv: an 11-year-old boy died under the rubble.

Title: Defense forces repulsed more than 130 enemy attacks: the hottest situation on two fronts
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy launched one missile and 58 air strikes on the territory of Ukraine (using, in particular, one missile and 68 anti-aircraft missiles), and used 663 kamikaze drones to destroy them. He carried out more than 3,800 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy attacked once near Vovchansk. In addition, the occupiers actively used aviation in this direction, in particular, the areas of Mali Prohody, Kudiivka and Kozacha Lopan were subjected to bombing. In the Kupyansk direction during the day, the enemy tried 20 times to advance to our positions near Sinkivka, Novoosynovy, Kolisnykyvka, Pershotravnevy, Pischany, Kruglyakivka, Zeleny Gay, Vishnevoy, Bohuslavka, Petropavlivka, Lozova and Zagryzovo. At the moment, two hostilities are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked 11 times in the districts of Katerynivka, Grekivka, Terniv, Zarichny, Druzhelyubivka, and in the Serebryansk Forestry. One skirmish is still going on, the rest have been stopped by our soldiers. On the Seversky direction twice during the day the enemy tried to break through our defenses in the areas of Verkhnokamianske and Bilogorivka settlements. In the Kramatorsk direction, enemy activity culminated in one combat encounter near Chasovoy Yar. In the Toretsk direction there were no attacks, but the enemy launched an air strike with unguided missiles on the settlement of Druzhba. The enemy tried 26 times to wedge into our defense on the Pokrovsky direction. The occupiers in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Sukhyi Yar, Novogrodivka, Vyshneve, Krutiy Yar, and Selidove were repulsed 22 times by our defenders. Four attacks have been ongoing so far. The enemy suffers significant losses - our soldiers neutralized more than 220 occupiers in this direction, 115 of them irreversibly. Two tanks, one artillery system, two units of automobile equipment and one UAV of the occupiers were destroyed, one unit of automobile equipment, two armored combat vehicles and one artillery system were also damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions near Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Illinka, Maksimilianivka, Gostroy, Elizavetivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, Kurakhivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, and Katerynivka. Currently, Ukrainian soldiers have repelled 26 attacks, 13 clashes are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction our troops repelled enemy attacks, near Bogoyavlenka, Maksimivka and Novoukrainka - five attacks were repelled, one is ongoing. In the Gulyajpil direction the enemy made one futile attempt to push our defenders from the occupied lines near the settlement of Charivne. The situation is under control. In the Orykhiv direction, the aggressor carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Mala Tokmachka and Preobrazhenka. A total of 14 aerial bombs were used. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk region, so far 19 strikes by 20 Russian guided aerial bombs have been carried out on its territory. Soldiers of the 141st Separate Infantry Brigade and the 126th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, who inflict heavy losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment, were recognized for their effective and professional combat work. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy's UAV ground control station destroyed in the north of Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Consequences of the air strike on Kharkiv: an 11-year-old boy died under the rubble
Description: notifies the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. An 11-year-old child died as a result of the attack. The boy was freed from the rubble with severe head injuries and multiple fractures. Doctors tried to resuscitate the child for more than half an hour, but it was not possible to save him. As notified in the State Emergency Service, 35 people were injured. According to preliminary data, two more people, including a child, may remain under the rubble. It became known that rescuers unblocked body fragments from under the rubble. An identification examination will be conducted. So the number of dead increased to two people. Rescuers continue to work at the scene of the tragedy. We will remind you that the enemy KAB hit a nine-story building in Kharkiv: the number of victims is increasing.

Title: About the help of the army, mobilization, hate from Russian bots and family matters. Interview with ...
Description: This was discussed in first part interview. Today is the final part of the conversation. - I would like to talk about this. In your streams, you constantly invite your viewers to help the army, including financially. Aren't our people tired of helping the army? - Absolutely not! I have never positioned myself as a volunteer. And I want to emphasize this. Because, with certain exceptions, and it was literally several times, I try not to collect anything on my map. And my principle in this case is very simple. Since I am not a volunteer, I do not plan to solve any strategic tasks there. There are people, we have giant funds, they solve complex approaches. Even certain weapons systems are introduced with public money, and then they are already purchased in large batches from manufacturers by the Ministry of Defense. My approach as a citizen is to help our army on a daily basis. When, let's say, I carol at people, it is primarily in the interests of certain departments. I actually have only one rule: these should be people who really defend the Motherland with weapons in their hands, who are really at war. Because the army is big. If these are our fighters in the Kursk region or Donetsk region, of course, we need to help, help, help! And from the meetings that I sometimes organize, I see: why should anyone get tired of this. A lot of donations are sent from abroad. And it is clear from the surnames that these are not only people with Ukrainian roots. A lot of money is sent to Israel, from the USA, Canada, and the Baltic States. There are also many of them in Ukraine, in particular in Kyiv. Therefore, the people are ready to invest in their security. And this, it seems to me, is an absolutely undeniable thing. - And how do you feel about hate, or twisting of true facts in the comments to your videos? - I wouldn't say that I cover it a lot there. Well, they actually show how those Putin bots react, that this is all a -team game- for them. For example, when there were fights for Vugledar, no matter what I said, a bunch of comments from haters were of the same type: -but our Uglidar.- If you just treat it like an ordinary person, then you understand that this is your job. Well, since recently. For example, when it was decided that the meeting in Ramstein at the level of the heads of state of the anti-Putin coalition would simply be postponed because of hurricanes in the USA. Before this topic, I saw the same type of messages that -even a hurricane is on the side of Russia, you were fired, you were abandoned- and so on. Although everyone perfectly understands that all necessary decisions from the military and military-technical aspect may not be as fast as we would like, but they are all being adopted. And Biden wants, on the contrary, to say it himself, those messages. And when they write that -Biden is not going, but Biden abandoned you-, it's even a little funny, because the bots write everything the same. They, our enemies, told us about this 10 years ago, and they are telling us now. And there is no way they can understand that Ukraine was, is and will be. Therefore, I simply do not pay attention to such attacks. Well, my mother corresponds with such a category of people, trying to prove something to them. And I say: if you do not know this person personally, then there is no point in entering into a conversation with him. —From political and public issues, let's move, if you don't mind, to a personal question. Not only the physical enemy occupation, but also the war itself separated hundreds of thousands of Ukrainian families: men were in Ukraine, women and children were forced to live abroad. This happened to you too. That you miss your family is understandable. Nevertheless, what changes and transformations are taking place in your family? - I don't think that my story is any different from others. This is a test. Our family has complete understanding in such a situation. And it still seems to me that if there is an ability not to hear air alarms and, accordingly, not to live in the risks in which we live, then children should be saved from this. I, of course, have a longing for them. They are growing up, but in fact they do not see their father as often as they would like. There, abroad, they master two languages. Foreign I notice that their Ukrainian is not as fluent as before. But many people have even worse conditions for dating, for personal communication than I do. It is clear that conscripted men are not allowed to travel abroad, because everyone is obliged to defend the state, be registered and, if necessary, join the army. What about the children? We have so many destroyed settlements. It is better for them to grow up in Europe than to fall into Russian captivity, like the children of Mariupol, for example. Therefore, the situation is complicated, there are many uncertainties. I think we should each do our own thing. Children should grow, learn, and we should defend our country. It is clear that not everyone will return from forced evacuation, from emigration. And this should also be said directly. It is clear that the demographic situation in general will be the number one issue in Ukraine. But it is equally clear that many will want to return after the war, if they have somewhere to return to. Because many simply have nowhere to go. Upon their return, they will have a completely different level of requirements for school, for their city, and many, many other things. I actually understand the risks, I'm not sure there's any point in talking about it right now because the underlying issue isn't resolved. The basic issue is security, it's a war that's still going on. Well, we are now in Kyiv, there are many children here, many have not left, many are here. This is a personal decision. Criticize, suggest: no one knows how to do the right thing unequivocally. When you don't know how to act, act as you see fit. But I'm optimistic: many people will still come back here. Because, first of all, it's great to live here in Ukraine. What's most upsetting us here right now? War! And if we take away the factors of war, then, of course, not everything is as perfectly organized here as in many European states. But our compatriots will come here with new knowledge, with new acquaintances, with a new vision of the world, knowledge of languages, etc. — Following this personal thread. During a previous meeting in our editorial office, touching on the topic of your family, you said that your wife is a role model for you, but she has one flaw: a foreigner's passport. After all, like your children, you brought your beloved wife to Ukraine after a long business trip from Moscow. Has it been possible to solve this -documentary- problem? - Not yet, but we have done a lot for this and have taken a big step towards it. About a month ago, I attended an interview at the Security Service of Ukraine, which was conducted by officers of the counterintelligence department. And I think that everything will be as it should be, regarding the wife's acquisition of Ukrainian citizenship. Of course, there are some legal issues involved. The attitude of the Ukrainian state and the majority of our people to the holders of Russian passports during the war is understandable. My approach: you need to look at what a person actually does, not at his passport. There are people who use Russian passports to fight for Ukraine. And to immediately understand who is a rogue, a spy or an -exiled Cossack-, there are special services in this state for this. I am confident that everything will be fine for my family. - Now the topic of mobilization is perhaps the most discussed in our society. You are a media person, you constantly communicate with our fighters from the front line, organize help for them. But you also know the opinions of civilians about joining the Defense Forces. Is there any transformation taking place here in people's awareness of the need to defend the Motherland? - It is clear that during the war, the first-line soldier is the greatest treasure of the state. That is, being a rifleman in the first division of the first platoon of the first company of the first battalion of any mechanized brigade is the most difficult, the safest. These are just realities. And service in the army can also be very different. But still the most dangerous thing is what is called infantry, on which everything rests. No matter what anyone says, no matter how many drones there are, if there is no Ukrainian soldier, then they, the occupiers, will go on, on and on. So there are two aspects here, maybe even more. In my opinion, the most important thing is that the state should be sincere with its citizens. If the President says that we have a plan for victory, there are points that are addressed to partners, then they should tell us that in order to achieve this, exactly what efforts should be made on the part of the citizens of Ukraine. Because, on the one hand, we hear from high-ranking officials that everything is fine with mobilization, but there are other opinions on this matter. And no one cancels the obligation. And that's what mobilization is all about. We even have some deputies with scythes in the Rada, they say: we are against violent mobilization. So, I would like to tell these stupid populists that mobilization is already coercion. The word is violent, it is so colored. Some parliamentarians say that, as they say, we think about Ukrainians, but the rest - the generals, the president, the chief of the general staff - do not. Such things should simply be cut off and broadcast the thesis that everyone should be registered and ready to be drafted into the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. I am well aware of this and am registered with the TCC. I know that you are also standing. — As a video blogger, you are classified as an -opinion leader-. Roman Tsymbalyuk was one of the first in Ukraine to become a -millionaire YouTuber- by the number of subscribers. For this, the popular social network has a special award - the -golden button-. Did you get it? - Yes, this is the only thing I lack for complete happiness (laughs - Author). Two things, to be exact: victory in the war and the golden button. -Golden buttons- are currently not sent to Ukraine. On this popular video platform, they believe that we are in a military conflict zone. And that's why I don't physically have a -golden button- from YouTube. — So in the YouTube office, they associate such attention to your channel with Russian aggression? And in general, do you notice any decrease in the audience's interest in your page on this popular video hosting? Is there any personal secret to expanding the audience? - I think it's all about the content that the author makes. And in my case regarding the audience, the number of views, it's always this kind of multidirectionality in the graphs, -up and down-. That is, the audience in terms of the number of subscribers and views changes periodically, and you yourself need to change. This is YouTube, this platform is quite competitive. Many new authors appear. If there is no competitive television for the most part now, all the viewers have gone to YouTube. And if there is a desire to somehow keep your viewer so that he does not forget about you, then you have to work every day. And I work every day without a day off. And the main secret is that I just love this job. And specific surges of viewer interest are observed when significant events occur in domestic politics or in the international arena. But, I repeat, you have to work every day. Since 2022, since the beginning of the large-scale Russian aggression, it can be said that there is a decline in the number of views. Maybe 20 percent. And the very beginning of the war, it led to some crazy flourishing of the Ukrainian segment on YouTube. It seems to me that the rule I work by is actually not only inherent to how this particular platform works, but to life in general. The head of this organization once said: -I have only one piece of advice for authors. You should do what you love and talk about what you believe in.- If you follow this rule, even outside of YouTube, you'll be fine no matter what you do. If a person is a doctor, if a person is a soldier, if a person is a journalist, it doesn't matter. I live by this principle and it is equally good for me to look into the eyes of a specific person, my viewer, any audience. Because I do not change my opinion about what Ukraine was, is and will be!

Title: - It is important not to -philonit-, but to get the most from the instructors-. Mobilization, traini...
Description: Now he is a junior sergeant, commander of the unmanned aerial vehicle division in the ranks of the 128th separate mountain assault brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Higher education, specialist diploma with honors in the field of IT. He is 31 years old. Before joining the army, he worked in real estate. After the large-scale invasion, he recalls, the field in which he worked somewhat -dimmed-. -There was no desire to sit and wait for an unknown amount of time. There was no certainty about tomorrow. There was no income for a month or one and a half. I came to our territorial defense, they promised to call me, but I never received a call,- the man recalls. That's how Roman found himself in the field of landscape design - he became a project manager. And once his team was offered to work with a facility in Transcarpathia. It was in May 2023. -To be honest, my colleagues were afraid to go there, but there was no way out. And when we were driving on the Torun Pass, we were stopped at a roadblock: the police checked the documents, and the representative of the TCC, after several clarifying questions, wanted us to move with him to clarify all the credentials. The next day I was already in Rivne at the training ground. There was no opportunity to get together, change clothes, grab something from home, everything happened somewhat spontaneously,- Roman recalls. Next came basic military training and leadership courses. We ask a military man what his impressions of BZVP are. -It's all individual. It doesn't matter what kind of training. What matters is that it exists. It is important to get the most out of what the instructors give you. It is important not to -philonit-, to turn on creativity sometimes in order to learn something and not to die in the first days on the battlefield. Maybe I'm wrong, but it's all very individual.- After that, he was assigned to the 128th separate mountain assault brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -I really didn't know until the end where I wanted to go and where I saw myself. At first I decided to go for a stormtrooper. We studied battle strategy, how to properly enter enemy trenches, etc. But then a person came to us who, according to certain criteria, selected people for the UAV unit. Two people were taken from us, the rest of the guys went to the fire support company. After that, we went directly to the site of hostilities - to the area occupied by our brigade.- Roman began training - first he mastered one type of drones, then he took up shock UAVs. It was already September 2023. During one of the combat missions, Roman eliminated the enemy's ammunition warehouse with two drops from a drone. We ask you to recall this case, but, he says, the crew sometimes does not even know that they are working on an enemy composition from BC. -We simply drop on specific targets that are pre-announced to us by operatives on duty or higher commanders. And then we see detonations, which give us the understanding that somewhere there was some BC… At first we threw it off - and then we already understand that we hit something fat and such joy overflows… And we understand that we are also contributing to the future victory.- In general, there are several crews in Roman's unit, which alternate among themselves, going on combat sorties. The longest such trip lasted 9 days. Roman also remembers the most delicious exercise: -We saw the enemy's equipment through the thermal imaging camera, which had recently been silenced… And we began to kill them with resets: we saw how they detonated, caught fire, burned! I can't say exactly the equivalent in terms of money, but it was definitely some BMP that brought the crew of their infantrymen to the assault.- Recently, Roman's crew came under fire. There were losses, Roman received a concussion. He says this is one of the hardest moments: losing colleagues. -I was always afraid of forgetting the algorithm of first aid, the sequence of actions when my brothers were injured. We pulled into the position, started to deploy, I was adjusting everything in the shelter… And the shelling began. When I came out of the shelter and saw what I saw, that was probably the most difficult thing: surviving that moment. Because there was no one to provide first aid.- The novel states: fear does not disappear from being in the area of ​​hostilities. -Yes, working for several days in a row, you get used to it to a certain extent and you begin to treat it somewhat easier morally. But the security measures we use come first. I think for myself and my staff. Therefore, I emphasize and repeat: for me, safety measures are in the first place. If I see some area where we can't pass because we might -burn- somewhere there, then I won't go, I'll just argue to the command that we weren't ready to take the risk. And in our country, by the way, the command is very loyal to this,- says the military man. He recalls that in the unit there were cases when people were lost. -And we drew certain conclusions from that. And we understand that we don't want to say goodbye to each other. And we are all well aware that we can wait literally 20 minutes and drive in safer conditions than risk it. Safety measures should not be taken lightly.- The novel advises civilians who, for various reasons, have not yet joined the ranks of the Defense Forces, to start studying the units that are actively participating in hostilities and to decide for themselves where they can go to serve. -It's mostly the fear of the unknown that can stop a person. And everyone is now terrified, afraid of any contact with the army, etc. But everyone had enough time to make a decision for themselves. If not ready to fight, there are other ways to be useful to the Defense Forces. You just have to put some effort into it.- In the end, we ask a military man what for him will be victory in the Russian-Ukrainian war. -Many moments affect the awareness and understanding of what victory is. For me, victory is when I come back. When I am demobilized. When there will be all the conditions for this. And when planes will be able to fly again in the peaceful skies of Ukraine. No matter how banal and childish it sounds.- Photo is from the personal archive of a serviceman

Title: The time for modernization has passed: how Japan will improve its main battle tanks
Description: Within announced By the Ministry of Defense of Japan in a profile document on procurement for the modernization of the fleet of Type 10 tanks, the agency of the -Land of the Rising Sun- formed specific technical tasks and stages of modernization of its main battle tanks, ArmiyaInform reports. According to the authors of the Army Recognition portal, who studied the aforementioned documents in detail, the Type 10 Hitomaru tank modernization program, created by Mitsubishi Heavy Industries and adopted for service in 2012, is aimed at strengthening the protection of tanks against current threats such as guided munitions and UAVs, including FPV drones. and ammunition drop systems. The technical goals of this update include improved protection against anti-tank weapons and drones, which are increasingly common in today's combat scenarios. According to information provided by the Defense Acquisition, Technology and Logistics Agency (ATLA) of the Ministry of Defense, three active defense systems were selected for evaluation: Rafael's Trophy and Elbit's Iron Fist from Israeli manufacturers and Rheinmetall's Strike Shield from German tank builders. These systems were selected based on specific criteria, including topside threat protection, 360° interception capabilities, and a total weight of less than 1,000 kg. At the same time, Japan's Ministry of Defense also decided to test the Kongsberg RS6 remote module equipped with a 30 mm cannon. It is expected that this module will be integrated into an active defense system and will have sensors capable of detecting high-speed objects, including UAVs. The purpose of such an innovation is to increase the ability of Type 10 tanks to face air threats, while providing effective protection against ground risks. While the exact number of Type 10 Hitomaru battleships to be upgraded has not yet been disclosed, Japan plans to purchase approximately 300 RS6 modules, which will be produced domestically at a rate of 10 units per year. In addition, the Far Eastern country continues to produce new Type 10 tanks, and in 2025 there are plans to order 12 more vehicles to increase the total number to 148 units. Ultimately, around 300 tanks of this type are expected to be produced. The Ministry of Defense is also considering the development of additional protection modules that could be installed on the Type 10 tanks. The combat vehicles will be designed with modularity in mind and will be able to install new systems directly from the factory, facilitating the integration of advanced technologies. In a broader context, official Tokyo continues to strengthen its defense capabilities, including the production of new Patria armored personnel carriers (about which our agency told in previous materials) for the Ground Self-Defense Forces of Japan, made on the island of Hokkaido. This initiative underscores the importance Japan attaches to modernizing its military forces in response to rapidly evolving global threats. Japanese Type 10 Hitomaru main battle tank. Video: Army Encyclopedia

Title: Putin chauvinists put up imaginary posters in Kyiv: why is this the enemy
Description: Quite unexpectedly, this slogan was mentioned again. This time in Kyiv. The so-called pro-Russian -resistance of the NOD-, which exists only in the sick imagination of chauvinists-Putinists, put up 1000 posters in the Ukrainian capital with this slogan and a portrait of a bunker rat. Naturally, no one has ever seen these posters, as well as -NOD partisans-, except for enemy telegram channels and other propaganda resources. But for fakers, this is not a problem. They took a photo of the Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra from an article in the Ukrainian media and pasted Putin posters on it in a photo editor. Locations in other photos and videos distributed by the Russians cannot be identified at all. There is no reason to claim that such postcards could have appeared in Kyiv and Ukraine in general. Most likely, this is a production whose purpose is to show that at least someone in Ukraine is -waiting- for Putin and does not perceive him as an aggressor.

Therefore, we must stop Russia together,- the President of Ukraine noted. Kharkiv Mayor Ihor Terekhov announced that the 6th to the first floors were completely destroyed. -There is a child under the rubble - rescuers are trying to get him out. At the moment, we have information that three people may be under the rubble. There are already 18 victims,- ​​Ihor Terekhov noted. Later, the head of the Kharkiv State Administration Oleg Synegubov added that it is already known about 19 wounded. The search for people continues. -The destruction of the house from the enemy KABU is quite significant, which threatens the collapse and the work of rescuers in general. Despite this, employees of the State Emergency Service are working as quickly as possible to clear the debris. The enemy once again chose the night time for terror, when people are at home as families,- he said. According to preliminary data, the enemy hit the FAB-500. Information is being updated

Title: From a soldier to a company commander: the story of a guardsman on pseudo-Topol-

Title: The President visited the wounded soldiers in Uzhgorod and awarded them state awards

Courage, which is always of decisive importance - both on the battlefield and in political decisions,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He also inspected the x-ray vascular diagnostics and rehabilitation rooms, which are equipped with modern equipment and devices for treatment.
