Title: The Ministry of Defense simplified the return of property and introduced new models of uniforms
Description: This is stated in the message at sites MOU. In particular, the return of inventory property by servicemen has been simplified. There are also new elements of uniforms that meet NATO standards. -Changes in physical support were expected by the military, who had difficulties with handing over inventory property. These are sleeping bags, sleeping bags, flasks and other things. They can be lost or destroyed in battle. Our soldiers should focus on the combat mission, and we will give new uniforms,- ​​stressed the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Rustem Umyerov. These changes are aimed at increasing the combat readiness of the Armed Forces and improving service conditions for servicemen. The Ministry of Defense continues to work on improving the support system, taking into account the current challenges and needs of the army. -The introduction of new items of uniform, such as a special body armor with positive buoyancy and adaptive clothing for the wounded, as well as the simplification of bureaucratic procedures for the return of property, should make the service much easier for servicemen. A reduction in inventory that is subject to return will also reduce the administrative burden on the accounting system. From now on, every serviceman will receive his equipment without complicated exchange procedures,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. Amendments to the Order of the Ministry of Defense No. 232 of April 29, 2016 were made by the Order of the Ministry of Defense No. 654 of October 1, 2024.

Title: He does not look for easy ways: an Odessa citizen who crossed the border illegally twice was detaine...
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. The offender tried to escape and hid in the woods, ignoring demands to stop. To detain him, border guards had to fire warning shots upwards. The detainee turned out to be a 30-year-old resident of Odesa. He was taken to the border unit to process documents regarding an administrative offense for illegal border crossing. The man admitted that in September he illegally crossed the border into the EU through a forest in Bukovina, making his way to Romania for four days. After unsuccessful attempts to find work in Germany, he decided to return to Ukraine, again choosing an illegal route outside the checkpoints. -Currently, at checkpoints across the state border of Ukraine, border guards have repeatedly identified persons returning after illegally crossing the border. Border guards draw up administrative proceedings against such citizens for illegally crossing the border,- the department added. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Defense Forces told about enemy assaults from buggies in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: The spokeswoman of the 38th separate brigade of the marines, Olena, told about this on Army TV Salt beef. -Yesterday, the enemy started using buggies during their assaults, this was the case before. To date, we have already destroyed three such buggies and damaged one,- said Olena Solonina. According to her, four motorized rifle brigades are currently opposing the Ukrainian marines, the most involved being the 74th motorized rifle brigade of the Russian Federation from the Kemerovo region. -This is exactly the infamous brigade that caused a lot of trouble during the occupation in the Chernihiv region,- the spokeswoman added. She also said that today our marines also destroyed a Russian tank with an FPV drone. This is the first tank hit by the 38th Brigade in the Pokrovsky direction. As reported by ArmyInform, on October 30, in the Pokrovsky direction, the occupiers -na-shodi/->made 11 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Myrnograd, Lysivka, Sukhyi Yar, Novogrodivka and Selidove settlements. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repulsed nine enemy attacks, two clashes are still ongoing.

Title: At the age of 21, he became the commander of a tank platoon and thereby realized his life's dream: t...
Description: The story of the soldier was made public by the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The guy loves his job very much, because he dreamed about it since he was 10 years old. As a child, -Boar- played a computer game about tanks, and at the age of 21, he made his dream come true. He calls his own tank -Swallow- and explains it like this: -When my combat vehicle moves, this sound is like a bird singing to me.- Kaban is very proud of the battalion in which he serves. -This is an exceptional unit. He showed himself in many important battles, in particular in the battle for Avdiivka. People here are motivated, combative, professionals in their field,- says the soldier. According to the commander, our advantage over the enemy lies in motivated people who clearly know what they are fighting for. The main goal is to protect Ukrainians, regain their own and restore peace. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces showed remote mining in the line of fire.

Title: The occupiers shelled Kupyansk and Kucherivka: there is a dead person, injured policemen

A 57-year-old woman and two men, 51 and 58 years old, were treated for blast injuries. In the village of Kucherivka, a 42-year-old man was killed by shelling, another 42-year-old man was wounded. Investigative and operational teams, forensic experts and explosives experts quickly went to the scene of the events. Title: The defense ministers of Ukraine and Norway discussed strengthening the Ukrainian air defense system...
Description: He announced this on his official page. -We are sincerely grateful to Norway for its comprehensive support - political, economic, diplomatic and military. I express special thanks to Mr. Gram for his leadership in allocating a new aid package of 500 million euros, as well as for the decision to transfer F-16 aircraft to Ukraine already this year,- said the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. During the meeting, our joint steps to strengthen air defense were discussed. Norway is ready to co-finance the strengthening of Ukrainian air defense and allocate 118.8 million US dollars for the purchase of weapons systems and spare parts for Ukrainian F-16s as part of the US Jumpstart initiative- -These initiatives increase the level of our defense capabilities, bringing us closer to the strategic goal of safe skies over Ukraine. One of the key topics of today's meeting was cooperation in the field of joint procurement and attraction of investments in the Ukrainian defense and industrial complex,- said Rustem Umyerov.

Title: The employees of Ukrposhta branches and relay cabinets of Ukrzaliznytsia were detained
Description: reports this by the Security Service of Ukraine. The Security Service and the National Police detained three more arsonists who were active in Kyiv and Zhytomyr region. Their priority -goals- were branches of Ukrposhta and relay cabinets of Ukrzaliznytsia. The extras acted on the order of the special services of the Russian Federation in exchange for the promise of -easy money-. However, after committing the crimes, none of the participants received the funds. Instead, the perpetrators received suspicion from Ukrainian law enforcement officers. In Kyiv, a 16-year-old student of the capital's professional and pedagogical college was arrested -on hot pursuit-, who set fire to three branches of Ukrposhta in different districts of the city. In order to commit crimes, the perpetrator purchased an incendiary mixture, which he then poured into the premises of state institutions through the broken windows. In Zhytomyr Oblast, two more people were arrested for trying to burn down the relay box that regulates the movement of trains on the strategically important line of Ukrzaliznytsia. They turned out to be a 27-year-old drug addict and a 38-year-old recidivist who has a criminal record for possession of a cold weapon and causing intentional grievous bodily harm. The extras acted in a -tandem-: one of them set fire to the railway equipment, and the other recorded the fire on camera for a -report- to the Russian curator. During the searches, mobile phones, SIM cards, clothes, shoes, backpacks and canisters with evidence of criminal activities were seized from all three detainees. The perpetrators were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Previously ArmyInform reported that the border guards put the -schemes- to sniff the grass.

Title: The capital's military institute named the number of combatants among cadets and teachers
Description: This was reported by ArmyInform acting head of the press service of Taras Shevchenko KNU Military Institute, Lieutenant Oleksandr Brytvych. -With the beginning of the ATO/OOS, the cadets and trainees actively continued to incorporate the combat experience gained by the officers and cadets of the institute during the repulse of Russia's armed aggression on the territory of Ukraine into the educational program for obtaining an education,- he said. According to him, since February 24, 2022, a lot has changed in the technique of conducting military operations. Approaches and strategies to training military personnel have also undergone drastic changes. -Currently, at VIKNU, about 5% of cadets are participating in hostilities, these are cadets of both the fourth year of study and the first. And about 80% of the institute's teaching officers and sergeants-instructors are combatants,- Oleksandr Brytyvych said. He emphasized that currently it is very important to practice this experience with cadets and trainees in order to improve existing knowledge and transfer new practical skills that will be needed in the combat zone. We will remind, according to the results of this year's entrance campaign at VIKNU, 45% of applicants who -navchayetsya-najbilshe-zhinok/->enrolled in full-time education, are women. Title: Russians attacked a cemetery in Sumy Oblast: one person was killed and one injured

Under the procedural leadership of the Sumy District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation is being conducted on the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder. The weapon fell on the territory of the local cemetery, resulting in the death of a 73-year-old woman and the injury of a 42-year-old man. Prosecutors, in cooperation with other law enforcement officers, document the consequences of the shootings. Title: Magyar arranged a deadly picnic for the Russians, a knocked-out tank saves the infantry: a stream fr...

Near the village of Grodivka in Donetsk region, Russian infantrymen tried to suddenly jump on our positions. These positions were held by the Chervona Kalina NSU brigade. Having let the enemy to the positions, the Guards used all means of destruction in a coordinated manner on the attack aircraft. Those of the Russians who survived the artillery and drones were destroyed by the Guardsmen with machine guns. On the Kurakhiv direction 46, a separate airmobile brigade repelled another enemy assault on its positions. This time, the Russians threw five BMPs and two tanks into battle. In just fifteen minutes, four BMPs and two tanks were destroyed by artillery fire, FPV drones and mines. The enemy infantry was destroyed by drones. Title: President: Ukraine always offers only that which will really help push for real peace
Description: This was announced by the Head of State in his evening address. -I spoke here today with the heads of communities of the region, with business representatives. There was a meeting together with First Deputy Prime Minister Svyridenko with the business of the region. And this business is also relocated from other regions of our country. We see how production is growing here, what are the prospects, and at the same time there are questions, there are problems. We will definitely help with solutions,- the President emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also said that he will visit our guys — soldiers who are undergoing rehabilitation after injuries. -Our fighting boys are from our brigades fighting in Donetsk region, Vovchansk, Kurshchyna. I want to thank them on behalf of all our people — from all of Ukraine — and to honor them with state awards for such necessary work, such service, for their such necessary bravery. Courage, which is always decisive: both on the battlefield and in political decisions. We really hope for the courage of our partners,- added the Head of State. We remind you that Volodymyr Zelensky criticized partners for leaking data on Tomahawk missiles.

Soldiers with these skills are able to clear areas, build and strengthen shelters, create obstacles for the enemy, and protect infrastructure. Engineer and sapper training allows you to prevent losses and increases the mobility of units, providing a tactical advantage on the battlefield.
